name: The boomerang guy in hell
description:
A VimJam 2020 entry : The boomerang guy in hell.

My first ever game jam entry :O

You live a peaceful life in the clouds, but one day a skeleton appears in the graveyard. You take care of it but karma happens and you end up in hell.

Your goal is to find your way out of hell with the help of your boomerang and by relearning skills from your past life which help you proceed to places you couldn't reach before.

The game takes anywhere between 10 to 30 minutes to beat and it is quite easy. 

Or if you feel like speed running you can complete the game in under 5 minutes quite easily. My personal time record is 3:20
